Staffing Services | Skill Development | Advisory Services - Vision India Home Staffing » Permanent Staffing » Temporary Staffing » Just Portal: JustJob » Digital Campus Hiring » Payroll Services » EoR + Offshoring Solutions » Managed Services Solution Skilling » Our Projects » Our Courses » e-Skilling Advisory Services » Management Development Technology About Us CSR Contact More » Awards » Employ India Campaign » News Gallery » Knowledge Center » Life @ Vision India » Governance » Our Blog Previous Next Vision India : Trusted Global Partner for  Staffing, Skilling & Advisory Services A Decade of Delivering Customized People Solutions with Unwavering Quality and Trust Vision India Services Pvt Ltd is a leading provider of staffing and Human Resources Management solutions that cater to the 
dynamic and diverse needs of businesses across the world. We offer a comprehensive bouquet of services that include 
Staffing Solutions, Payroll Management, Human Resource Consulting, Compliance Management, Capability Building, and 
Training and Development, woven around employee management. Our technology-driven approach ensures seamless integration of our solutions & platforms with the existing systems and processes 
of our clients, delivering a seamless integration, empowering clients to streamline their operations and optimize productivity 
and profitability. We take pride in being the preferred staffing partner for a diverse range of industry segments, including IT, 
healthcare, finance, engineering, hospitality, and many more. Vision India's Quality Management certifications are a testament to our commitment to quality and excellence in all that we 
do and deliver for our clients. We strive to continuously enhance the value we offer to our clients and are dedicated to 
providing exceptional customer service. Under the staffing business vertical, We offer Staffing Services to the businesses seeking flexible and dynamic workforce solutions. 
We specialize in temporary staffing & headcount outsourcing, which allows companies to scale up & drive initiatives with a committed 
workforce segment without long-term commitments. We also nurture skill development initiatives and projects to align with the national 
agenda for relevant skill augmentation. By providing client-centric solutions and maintaining high ethical standards in our operations, 
Vision India helps businesses find the right talent for their needs and enhance workplace productivity. Vision India is one of the highest rated Staffing Company that provide managed staffing services, payroll processing, advisory services, 
skill development, dynamic staffing services and manpower outsourcing. We are committed to empowering our clients to achieve their 
business goals through optimized investments in their workforce and provide innovative and bespoke people solutions that cater to 
the dynamic and diverse needs of our clients. Vision India is one of the leading with leading Staffing Companies that provide managed staffing services, payroll processing, 
advisory services, skill development, dynamic staffing services, dynamic staffing agency, and manpower outsourcing. 
We are committed to empowering our clients to achieve their business goals through optimized investments in their workforce and
provide innovative and bespoke people solutions that cater to the dynamic and diverse needs of our clients. Vision India, with a decade of credence has evolved into a boutique organization with the complete spectrum of People Solutions, 
offering differentiated solutions to the vibrant & dynamic business needs of the corporates. We draw our strength from the ability 
to dimension holistic solutions, having a bouquet of products & services integrated on seamless technology & backed by our ability 
to customize the solutions according to the Client needs. In this decade long journey, we have earned & sustained the Trust of organizations, as their Preferred Staffing Partner, across
Industry segments and a complete geographic spread across the country, South East Asia, Middle East and across Europe and the United States. Our customer centricity is further ensured by ISO 14001-2015, ISO 9001-2015, ISO 10002-2018, ISO/IEC 20000 and ISO 27001-2013 Certifications. 
We sustain unwavering focus on consistently delivering quality services to our Clients enabling them to achieve Business Goals 
through Productivity & Rationalized investments in the workforce. Read More » Government Projects DDUGKY Ministry of Rural Development Partnering Bihar Rural Livelihood Promotion Society we cater to the occupational aspirations of Youth of Bihar, 
train and make them employable. PMKVY Ministry of Skill Development Entrepreneurship Vision India is affiliated with PMKVY for its successful implementation 
with an objective to enable and mobilize a large number of Indian youth and make India Employable. Vocational Training Program Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan Vision India is affiliated with PMKVY for its successful implementation 
with an objective to enable and mobilize a large number of Indian youth and make India Employable. DONALDO VISANI - OLC | Ohlson Lavoie Corporation About Work Insight Careers Contact About Work Insight Careers Contact DONALDO (DONI) VISANI Senior Principal Donaldo is a Senior Principal with experience in a wide variety of project types, including recreation, sports centers, spas, hospital-based wellness, fitness, housing, and hotels. He has a keen sense for creative and cost-effective design solutions. One of Donaldo’s greatest attributes is working hand-in-hand with boards, commissions, stakeholders and members to develop project goals and oversee the complex process of fine-tuning a design to completely meet everyone’s needs. Donaldo’s experience includes programming, planning, design, documentation and construction administration of projects from start to finish. He is a Lead Designer who is involved in client management, public speaking, and industry presentations. Donaldo is also skilled in specification writing, construction documentation, materials research, budgeting, cost estimating and scheduling. Education Andrews University, Bachelor of Architecture with Honors License Licensed Architect – AZ, CA, CO Hobbies I regularly commute 26 miles by bike. I play soccer and ski. Fun Facts I can juggle, dance and do animal impressions. I won a bicycle in a poetry contest.
